mainTitle: Suuqgeynta Tooska ah: Ogolaanshaha, Ka-noqoshada & Ururinta Xogta
mainIntro: Marka xakameeyaha xogta uu ku lug leeyahay hababka...

points.title: Ogolaansho Cad
points.description: Qofku waa inuu si toos ah u oggolaadaa...

points.title: Xog Cad
points.description: Bixi xog cad oo ku saabsan noocyada xiriirka...

points.title: Ficil Cad
points.description: Ogolaanshaha waa in lagu bixiyaa ficil muuqda.

points.title: Hab Sahlan
points.description: Bixi hab fudud sida xiriiriye joojinta isdiiwaangelinta...

points.title: Fulin Degdeg ah
points.description: Hubi in codsiyada ka-noqoshada si dhakhso ah loo fuliyo.

points.title: Xaqiijin
points.description: Dir fariin xaqiijin ah oo muujineysa in la helo codsiga.

points.title: Ixtiraam Doorashooyinka
points.description: Hubi in doorashada qofka la ixtiraamo dhammaan kanaalada.

onlineData.intro: Ururinta xogta onleenka ah waxaa laga helaa degellada...

types.title: Xogta Shakhsiyeed

bestPractices.title: Xakamaynta Isticmaalaha
